classes.name: Client
classes.description: The client for handling everything like interacting with other clients. You should be extending this or intiizliaing with new. See {@tutorial GettingStarted} for more information.

params.name: options
params.description: The object configuration to pass to this client.

props.name: options
props.description: The options the client was initialized with.

props.name: baseDirectory
props.description: The directory where all tokens and other files will be cached.

props.name: letsPlay
props.description: Handles when the client is ready and has successfully joined the server.

props.name: keepAlive
props.description: The keep alive handler.

props.name: pluginChannels
props.description: Introduces plugin channels to the client.

props.name: production
props.description: Whether or not this process is in production or not.

props.name: version
props.description: The Minecraft Version of the server we are connecting to. Set to '1.16.4' by default, 'false' to auto-detect.

props.name: destroyed
props.description: If this client was destroyed. It will prevent the client from reconnecting.

props.name: reconnecting
props.description: If this manager is currently reconnecting one or multiple shards

props.name: splitter
props.description: Splitter that will be used to read packets.

props.name: framer
props.description: Framer that will be used to rebuild packets.

props.name: compressor
props.description: The compressor used deflate packets.

props.name: decompressor
props.description: The decompressor used to gunzip packets.

props.name: cipher
props.description: The cipher used to encrypt packets to the server.

props.name: decipher
props.description: The decipher used to decript packets from the server.

props.name: propertyState
props.description: Current state of the protocol handler.

props.name: serializer
props.description: Packet serializer

props.name: deserializer
props.description: Packet deserializer

props.name: closeTimer
props.description: The timer for detecting if we disconnected or lost connection with the remove server

props.name: state
props.description: The state this bot is in with trying to connect to the remote host.

props.name: compressionThreshold
props.description: Fetches the current compression threshold to be used with the compressor.

methods.name: login
methods.description: The entry function to connect your bot to your specific server.

methods.name: setCompressionThreshold
methods.description: Sets the threshold for compression based on data recieved from packets.

params.name: threshold
params.description: The threshold from any packets recieved from the minecraft server.

methods.name: setSocket
methods.description: Sets and creates all of the events needed for the socket.

methods.name: setEncryption
methods.description: Used to create the cipher/decipher engine after yggdrasil server authentication.

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Used to completely destroy the bot. Use end if you want to eventually reconnect.

methods.name: end
methods.description: Used to end the current session. Use destroy() if you do not wish to reconnect.

params.name: reason
params.description: Reason for ending the bot's current session.

methods.name: write
methods.description: Writes packet data to serializer if possible.

methods.name: writeRaw
methods.description: Writes RAW Buffer Data to framer/compressor.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Connects to the host specified in BaseClientOptions.

returns.description: socket A network socket for the server

events.name: session
events.description: Emitted when a minecraft session has been established.

events.name: success
events.description: Emited when a client has successfully joined a server.

props.name: host
props.description: A hostname or ip pointing to the server you wish to join.

props.name: port
props.description: The port of the server you wish to connect to.

props.name: production
props.description: Whether this server is in production (changes the way this handles errors.)

props.name: version
props.description: Whether to specify a specific version to connect with. False = Auto.

props.name: customPackets
props.description: Custom packets to include.

props.name: offlineMode
props.description: Whether or not we are connecting to an offline server. If true, no need for password.

props.name: keepAlive
props.description: Whether or not to setup and run the keepAlive ping to the server.

props.name: userAgent
props.description: The user agent to pass to Microsoft/Mojang API.

props.name: sessionServer
props.description: What session server to use when authenticating when attempting to join.
